title: Evil pumpkin icon
body: It's been almost 2 weeks I still dont have the icon I sent my friend a chroma skin can you guys check on that

replies.body: We're still sending these icons out until the *17th*, so hang on for a bit longer. If you don't have it after the 17th passes by, [hit us up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about it.
